--- "Gordon Mohr (@Internet Archive)"
<gojomo@...> wrote:

> Christoph Spielmann wrote:
> > Hi everybody!
> > 
> > We are using build heritrix-1.3.0-200412111608 at
> the
> > moment for our project. It works fine with Windows
> XP
> > (with/without Service Pack 1) but NOT with Service
> > Pack 2. We tried it with two different computers
> with
> > SP 2 installed and got the same result in both
> cases.
> > Now my question is: Has anybody been able to use a
> > version of Heritrix successfully with Windows XP
> > Service Pack 2?
> 
> Can you be more specific about how it doesn't work?
> 
> Does it not launch? Launch but crash? Launch and run
> but not make expected progress? Etc.
> 
> Do other Java apps work with the same VM?
> 
> - Gordon @ IA
> 
First of all thanks for the answers! The problem is
that it's not my machine we have troubles with it's my
friends computer and he's living about 2 1/2 hrs away
from me, so i dunno what the problem is exactly. Next
week i'm going to see the prof, who assigned this
project to us and he's having the same strange
troubles with heritrix. Both guys aren't very well
versed with heritrix as it was my task to integrate
Heritrix into our project. Strange thing is tho, that
it works WITHOUT any problems on my machine (i have SP
1 installed) and my uncle's (he has no SP installed at
all) so it was my guess that there might be a problem
with SP2 but next thursday (hopefully) i'll know more!

Regards,

Christoph
